description: Nightly planning and reflection entries - Import THIRTEENTH

sample_data.accomplishments: ["Completed morning workout for 35 minutes", "Finished project presentation for team meeting", "Called mom and had a great conversation", "Read productive chapter on habit stacking", "Avoided junk food at office party"]
sample_data.challenges: ["Struggled with focus during afternoon meetings", "Skipped lunch due to back-to-back calls", "Felt tempted by social media during work"]
sample_data.lessons_learned: Need to block time for lunch and take breaks between meetings. Also realized that prep work the night before makes mornings much smoother.
sample_data.gratitude: ["Supportive family who checks in regularly", "Good health that allows me to exercise", "Meaningful work that challenges me", "Having a warm home during winter"]
sample_data.top_priorities: ["Review quarterly goals and plan next quarter", "Team standup meeting at 9 AM", "Gym session focusing on upper body", "Finish reading current book chapter"]
sample_data.energy_plan: Start with high-energy creative tasks in morning (goal review), schedule admin work for afternoon when energy typically dips, save gym for evening to decompress
sample_data.sleep_routine: ["Read for 15 minutes", "10 minutes of meditation", "No screens 1 hour before bed", "Prepare tomorrow's clothes", "Review gratitude list"]
sample_data.sleep_environment: Cool room temperature (18Â°C), blackout curtains, white noise machine, phone in airplane mode
